arculusScan_nfcDisabled_message: Please enable NFC in system settings to continue.
arculusScan_lostTagError_message:
NFC Session lost the connection with the tag.
Please retry.
arculusScan_unknownTagError_message:
NFC Session detected an unknown tag.
Please retry.
arculusScan_cardBlockedError_message: Your card is blocked, to set a new PIN got through Forgot PIN recovery flow for your arculus.
